title: any fast ways to level up and easy champions
body: i have been playing for a month for now and i have been leveling up fairly slowly but i manage to beat some friends to higher levels i have gotten to level 27 and i want to get to level 30 i have found a way that i rank up quick which is winning a really long game but is there any other ways to rank up and also a really easy champion to use

replies.body: Since when is Yasuo an easy champ?
Since always, hes easy for me atleastt

Buy a Xp boost because it doubles the Xp you earn. But I don't think you need it anymore since you are level 27, 3 more levels away from 30. I leveled my account to level 30 without an xp boost within a week, it's not that hard to level up your account.

Like everyone here said if you want it that bad just buy an xp boost (Double xp) and just play what champion you are best on for more chance to win. Also for the love of god please do not play ranked once you hit 30 unless you have won like 500-1000 normals you will regret it.
well I mean you'll probably still end up in silver so...
Buy an exp boost if you want to level faster. Forget about an "easy champ" just play whoever you think you will enjoy.
